data.name: GoK
data.detailed_description:
Game of kingdoms [/ b] [/ i] - is adventures of warriors of the three kingdoms on forgotten territory.

  -You have been called by being of whose origin you dont know avrything/ Your task is to survive and protect the peaple who followed you to new lands. The world shrouded in mysteries and full of Daugerous enemies you need to win, is waiting for you.


 - You don"t get any help from the outside world. Everything you gave is you andthose you gave led with you to new lands you will have to get used to on the run to these severe lands, build defenses, get resources for the village. You will have to explore the undergrounds this world is full of with. In the cruel forest your life is at risk all the time, at any moment you can be finished off by wild animals and awful monsters.

PLOT
  -A being unknown Rognar before, penetrated into his dream. Rognar made his mind to go campaign gaving taken five ships with brave worriors with him. Its a result, the being led Rognar to new lands. Having landed on the bauk and explored it Rognars peaple chanced upon on ancient altar. When Ragnar came up to it, the statue started talking to him in a voice of the being from his dreams. He decided to gather a squad and go exploring, gaving ordered his men to start building the camp.

Game process.
- Participate in fierce battles with enemies, explore dark creepy dungeons, solve puzzles to access new treasures.
data.about_the_game:
Game of kingdoms [/ b] [/ i] - is adventures of warriors of the three kingdoms on forgotten territory.

  -You have been called by being of whose origin you dont know avrything/ Your task is to survive and protect the peaple who followed you to new lands. The world shrouded in mysteries and full of Daugerous enemies you need to win, is waiting for you.


 - You don"t get any help from the outside world. Everything you gave is you andthose you gave led with you to new lands you will have to get used to on the run to these severe lands, build defenses, get resources for the village. You will have to explore the undergrounds this world is full of with. In the cruel forest your life is at risk all the time, at any moment you can be finished off by wild animals and awful monsters.

PLOT
  -A being unknown Rognar before, penetrated into his dream. Rognar made his mind to go campaign gaving taken five ships with brave worriors with him. Its a result, the being led Rognar to new lands. Having landed on the bauk and explored it Rognars peaple chanced upon on ancient altar. When Ragnar came up to it, the statue started talking to him in a voice of the being from his dreams. He decided to gather a squad and go exploring, gaving ordered his men to start building the camp.

Game process.
- Participate in fierce battles with enemies, explore dark creepy dungeons, solve puzzles to access new treasures.
data.short_description: Game of kingdoms [/ b] [/ i] - is adventures of warriors of the three kingdoms on forgotten territory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
